Join a community dedicated to your learning

Our growing community is a group of professionals dedicated to improving themselves, their code, and their personal projects.

Enroll in hands-on premium workshops

Our workshops are more than just video tutorials. You'll build real apps and communicate directly with a thoughtbot developer.

Collaborate with community members

The community is dedicated to helping you grow through knowledge sharing. Our discussion platform is staffed with thoughtbot developers to allow you to communicate directly with the experts.

Exclusive content weekly

Prime Bytes, our private blog, are published to your dashboard every week. Learn tips, tricks, and best practices. Read our books, published to you iteratively, and updated weekly. Learn vim, development tools, and more with our screencasts.

The journey doesn't end there...

We're focused on delivering continuous learning through community involvement, cutting-edge content, and teaching the latest in development practices.
